about.title: About CROPSEN
about.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing premium organic plant care solutions that are safe, effective, and environmentally responsible.
about.tagline: From the Earth, For the Earth
about.missionText: To revolutionize agriculture through innovative organic solutions that enhance crop productivity while preserving the environment for future generations. We believe in sustainable farming practices that benefit farmers, consumers, and the planet.

2020.title: Foundation
2020.description: CROPSEN was founded with a vision to revolutionize organic plant care

2021.title: First Products
2021.description: Launched our first line of chemical-free plant nutrition products

2022.title: Market Expansion
2022.description: Expanded to serve customers across Pakistan with proven results

2023.title: Research & Development
2023.description: Established R&D facility for advanced organic formulations

2024.title: Global Vision
2024.description: Working towards sustainable agriculture solutions worldwide

about.timelineSubtitle: Milestones in our commitment to organic excellence
about.storyText1: CROPSEN was born from a passion for sustainable agriculture and a deep concern for the harmful effects of chemical fertilizers and pesticides on our environment and health.
about.storyText2: Founded by agricultural experts and environmental enthusiasts, we set out to create a line of plant care products that would be both effective and completely safe for families and the ecosystem.
about.storyText3: Today, CROPSEN stands as a trusted brand in organic plant care, helping thousands of gardeners and farmers grow healthier plants naturally.
